files.README.md:
# Super Agent Marketplace

Collections of Claude Code plugins, skills and tools.

## Installation

### Claude Code plugin marketplace

Add the marketplace:
```bash
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/bowentan/super-agent
```

Install plugins:
```bash
/plugin install prd@super-agent
/plugin install prd@1.0.0@super-agent
```

### npx skills add (open agent skills CLI)

Using the [skills](https://www.npmjs.com/package/skills) CLI you can install these skills into Claude Code (and other agents like Cursor, Codex, OpenCode):

```bash
# Install all skills from this repo (interactive: choose skills and agents)
npx skills add bowentan/super-agent

# Install only for Cursor
npx skills add bowentan/super-agent -a cursor

# Install specific skills
npx skills add bowentan/super-agent --skill prd --skill update-mr-desc --skill git-commit-bullets

# List available skills without installing
npx skills add bowentan/super-agent --list
```

>[!CAUTION]
> For Cursor, copy skills instead of symlinks.

## Marketplace Structure

Plugins are registered in `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` following Claude Code's marketplace standard.

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description | Prerequisites |
|--------|-------------|---------------|
| [prd](./plugins/skills/prd/) | Generate Product Requirements Documents for new features. Asks clarifying questions and writes structured PRDs to `docs/prds/`. | None. Provide a feature description or use triggers: *create a prd*, *write prd for*, *plan this feature*, *requirements for*, *spec out*. |
| [update-mr-desc](./plugins/skills/update-mr-desc/) | Update merge request descriptions by summarizing MR changes into a bulleted list (excluding `docs/`). | GitLab MR in context. **glab** MCP or the CLI tool. |
| [git-commit-bullets](./plugins/skills/git-commit-bullets/) | Perform git commits with the message body written as a bullet list; uses Conventional Commits and encourages split, well-scoped commits. | Git repository. Optional: project format/lint commands (e.g. `npm run format`, `ruff format`). |

## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](./docs/CONTRIBUTING.md) for plugin submission guidelines.

## Plugin Categories

- **skills/** - Claude Code skills for specific tasks
- **agents/** - Specialized agent configurations
- **tools/** - MCP tools and utilities
- **hooks/** - Event hooks and automation
- **templates/** - Project scaffolding templates

## License

MIT
